title: Ranked queues are really buggy and stuffed at the moment
body: In champion select it is very laggy and just then I couldn't pick a champion because connection timed out and lost my glorious 3 LP!!!

replies.body: Are you still getting such an issue? Try it out in custom games. Or does this only affect you when you play ranked?
PS: Some of my friends can still log in and play fine while some of us can't. Maybe an issue with the internet provider? (TPG)
